divs: Sighting DetailsIt was reported in the area Lakelander Newspaper(2010-2011) It was said it was Cigar shape and was hovering over the Whitney Dam ;lights on sides. This area near dam is an no fly zone for any airplanes ; etc. It was said it hovered and then took off at high rate of speed; then it was gone. So check the paper for more details . This is all I know. I think this should be checked out by other Mufon Investigators. Some around this area dont believe in UFO's.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Clifton
There were no other sightings in Clifton on or around January 1st 2010
Summary: This event was witnessed by a local citizen and was in the area paper. I dont know the exact date but you could check newspaper here. It was in our paper. The Lakelander in Whitney,Tx. The Ufo was reported as cigar shape and near the Whitney Dam
